channel.title: Client / Server Problem
channel.description:
ok a have a running server. works perfect. LD client works great too. now im trying to use an HD client but it wont load after "connecting to server". now i think i remember something that you edit in the server files that allows more than 1 client. im not sure where though. im using tokulscape or whatever.
Thanks, Brandon
